description: Number of partitions of n into parts 8k+2 or 8k+4.
formula: If n is even, a(n) ~ exp(Pi*sqrt(n/6)) * Gamma(1/4) / (4 * 6^(1/8) * Pi^(3/4) * n^(5/8)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 26 2015
mathematica: nmax = 100; Rest[CoefficientList[Series[Product[1/((1 - x^(8k+2))*(1 - x^(8k+4))), {k, 0, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x]] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 26 2015 *)
